languages.text: "На средних палубах... На средних палубах траур, Лорд-капитан. Во время нападения отсек был отрезан от системы жизнеобеспечения и энергоснабжения. Спасательные отряды не успели вовремя пробиться к запертым людям. Подсчет погибших еще ведется, но мы говорим о нескольких тысячах жертв".

"The middle decks... The middle decks are in mourning, Lord Captain. During the attack, some bays were cut off from the power and life support systems. The rescue crews failed to reach the trapped people in time. The death toll is still being finalised, but we have lost thousands."
languages.original_text: "На средних палубах... На средних палубах траур, Лорд-капитан. Во время нападения отсек был отрезан от системы жизнеобеспечения и энергоснабжения. Спасательные отряды не успели вовремя пробиться к запертым людям. Подсчет погибших еще ведется, но мы говорим о нескольких тысячах жертв".

traits.locale_text: "The middle decks... The middle decks are in mourning, Lord Captain. During the attack some chambers were cut from the energy network and life support system. The rescue crews couldn't get to the isolated people in time. The death toll is still being tallied, but we lost thousands."

"The middle decks... The middle decks are in mourning, Lord Captain. During the attack some chambers were cut from the energy network and life support system. The rescue crews couldn't get to the isolated people in time. The death toll is still being tallied, but we lost thousands."

"The middle decks... The middle decks are in mourning, Lord Captain. During the attack, some bays were cut off from the power and life support systems. The rescue crews failed to reach the trapped people in time. The death toll is still being finalised, but we have lost thousands."

"The middle decks... The middle decks are in mourning, Lord Captain. During the attack, some bays were cut off from the power and life support systems. The rescue crews failed to reach the trapped people in time. The death toll is still being finalised, but we have lost thousands."

"The middle decks... The middle decks are in mourning, Lord Captain. During the attack, some bays were cut off from the power and life support systems. The rescue crews failed to reach the trapped people in time. The death toll is still being finalised, but we have lost thousands."

languages.text: “中层甲板……中层甲板正处于一片悲痛之中，舰长大人。那场攻击切断了一部分舱室的电源与生命维持系统。救援人员没能及时赶到被困人员身边。目前我们依然在统计死亡人数，但已经确认遇难的船员数量多达几千名。”
languages.original_text: "The middle decks... The middle decks are in mourning, Lord Captain. During the attack, some bays were cut off from the power and life support systems. The rescue crews failed to reach the trapped people in time. The death toll is still being finalised, but we have lost thousands."

traits.locale_text: “中层甲板……中层甲板正处于一片悲痛之中，舰长大人。那场攻击切断了一部分舱室的电源与生命维持系统。救援人员没能及时赶到被困人员身边。目前我们依然在统计死亡人数，但已经确认遇难的船员数量多达几千名。”

languages.text: «Las cubiertas centrales... Las cubiertas centrales están de luto, Lord Capitán. Durante el ataque, algunas bahías han quedado aisladas de los sistemas de energía y soporte vital. Los equipos de rescate no han llegado a tiempo para rescatar a la gente atrapada. Todavía no hemos terminado de contar a los muertos, pero hay miles».
languages.original_text: "The middle decks... The middle decks are in mourning, Lord Captain. During the attack, some bays were cut off from the power and life support systems. The rescue crews failed to reach the trapped people in time. The death toll is still being finalised, but we have lost thousands."

traits.locale_text: «Las cubiertas centrales... Las cubiertas centrales están de luto, Lord Capitán. Durante el ataque, algunas bahías han quedado aisladas de los sistemas de energía y soporte vital. Los equipos de rescate no han llegado a tiempo para rescatar a la gente atrapada. Todavía no hemos terminado de contar a los muertos, pero hay miles».

languages.text: "Die mittleren Decks... Die mittleren Decks sind in Trauer, Lord Captain. Während des Angriffs wurden einige Buchten von der Energie und den Lebenserhaltungssystemen abgeschnitten. Die Rettungsmannschaften haben es nicht geschafft, die Eingeschlossenen rechtzeitig zu erreichen. Die Zahl der Todesopfer steht noch nicht fest, aber wir haben Tausende verloren."
languages.original_text: "The middle decks... The middle decks are in mourning, Lord Captain. During the attack, some bays were cut off from the power and life support systems. The rescue crews failed to reach the trapped people in time. The death toll is still being finalised, but we have lost thousands."

traits.locale_text: "The middle decks... The middle decks are in mourning, Lord Captain. During the attack, some bays were cut off from the power and life support systems. The rescue crews failed to reach the trapped people in time. The death toll is still being finalised, but we have lost thousands."

languages.text: « Les ponts intermédiaires... Les ponts intermédiaires sont en deuil, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Lors de l'attaque, certaines baies ont été privées d'alimentation et d'accès aux systèmes de survie. Les équipes de secours n'ont pas pu atteindre à temps les malheureux pris au piège. Le bilan n'est pas encore définitif, mais nous avons perdu des milliers d'âmes. »
languages.original_text: "The middle decks... The middle decks are in mourning, Lord Captain. During the attack, some bays were cut off from the power and life support systems. The rescue crews failed to reach the trapped people in time. The death toll is still being finalised, but we have lost thousands."

traits.locale_text: « Les ponts intermédiaires... Les ponts intermédiaires sont en deuil, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Lors de l'attaque, certaines baies ont été privées d'alimentation et d'accès aux systèmes de survie. Les équipes de secours n'ont pas pu atteindre à temps les malheureux pris au piège. Le bilan n'est pas encore définitif, mais nous avons perdu des milliers d'âmes. »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、中層デッキが…中層デッキが故人を追悼しています。襲撃中に、一部のベイで電力と生命維持システムが遮断されました。閉じ込められた人々のもとへ向かいましたが、救助クルーは間に合わなかったのです。死者数はまだ最終算出段階ですが、数千人もの人材を失っています」
languages.original_text: "The middle decks... The middle decks are in mourning, Lord Captain. During the attack, some bays were cut off from the power and life support systems. The rescue crews failed to reach the trapped people in time. The death toll is still being finalised, but we have lost thousands."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、中層デッキが…中層デッキが故人を追悼しています。襲撃中に、一部のベイで電力と生命維持システムが遮断されました。閉じ込められた人々のもとへ向かいましたが、救助クルーは間に合わなかったのです。死者数はまだ最終算出段階ですが、数千人もの人材を失っています」

languages.text: "Orta güverteler... Orta güverteler matem içinde Lord Kaptan. Saldırı sırasında bazı bölmelerin gücü kesildi ve yaşam destek sistemleri çalışmayı durdurdu. Kurtarma ekipleri, içeride kısılı kalmış insanlara ulaşmayı başaramadı. Ölü sayısı henüz kesinleşmedi ama kayıp sayılarımız binlerle ölçülecek."
languages.original_text: "The middle decks... The middle decks are in mourning, Lord Captain. During the attack, some bays were cut off from the power and life support systems. The rescue crews failed to reach the trapped people in time. The death toll is still being finalised, but we have lost thousands."
